page.title: 19Wareham.Religion.
page.content: There are five Churches in Wareham. The Church of England(Lady St.Mary and St. Martin's Chapel),Methodist,United Reformed,Evangelical.The Rector of Wareham said that only 5% of the population go the church regularly and that the 14-25 age range is the least represented social group.The Parish Church provides four Sunday services from the Holy Communion to the more informal Family Services.A wide range of activities are provided in the week.These range from facilities for the very young to groups for the older members of the Church.This is said to be an ecumenical Parish in which the churches work together.There is an ecumenical council.
